name: UITextItemInteraction
desc: Constants that indicate the type of interaction the user expects to have with a URL or text attachment.

items.name: case invokeDefaultAction
items.desc: The user wants to perform the default action on the text item; for example, opening a URL.

items.name: case presentActions
items.desc: The user wants to be presented with a list of actions that can be taken on the text item, such as opening the link in a different way or downloading content from the link.

items.name: case preview
items.desc: The user wants to get a preview of the content represented by the text item, such as by initiating a peek and pop on a link.
